title: New: Oceaán – Neéd U
content:
Since emerging last year with his debut track Haze, 20 year old Oceaán from Manchester has stayed relatively below the radar.

With the release of his latest track, the deeply soulful Neéd U, his r&b infused sounds are beginning to spread to a wider audience. Choppy beats and the stunning, versatile vocal merge flawlessly, forming what is one of the years finest tracks. It’s early days, but Oceaán is perhaps the most exciting young British producer to have emerged since a certain Jai Paul. Check out Neéd U below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
